remarks: Distribution law for the function operation and the composition of functions.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 17-Jul-2018.)
statement: ofco2 $p |- ( ( ( F e. _V /\ G e. _V ) /\ ( Fun H /\ ( F o. H ) e. _V /\ ( G o. H ) e. _V ) ) -> ( ( F oF R G ) o. H ) = ( ( F o. H ) oF R ( G o. H ) ) ) $.
